p: We investigated the clinical symptoms of all patients, and the results are shown in Fig 3. All patients had a fever, and 66.9% had a sore throat. The percentages of patients who experienced coughing with phlegm and without (60.7% and 59.3%, respectively) were similar. The percentage of patients with fatigue was 54.0%. The percentages of patients with headache and chills were the same (47.6%). Furthermore, 34.8% of the patients had diarrhea. The body temperatures of the trainers and trainees are shown in Fig 2B.
